name: Cynar Iced Tea
description: A super drinkable and surprisingly refreshing iced tea with a bitter kick that's easily scaled up to fill a pitcher.
recipeYield: 1 cocktail, makes enough green tea for 6 cocktails
recipeIngredient: 3 dashes Fee Brothers West Indian Orange Bitters

recipeInstructions.text: For the Iced Green Tea: Bring the water to a boil in a small saucepan. When it just reaches a boil, remove from heat and steep the tea for just 2 minutes. Let cool to room temperature and refrigerate until cool.
For Each Cocktail: Combine the Cynar, bitters, and green tea in a small glass. Stir to combine and top with ice. Garnish with lemon wedge if desired.
